<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>P</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>draw</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>a</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>♡</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>first</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>and a</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>♠</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>second</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">P({\text{draw}}\,{\text{a}}\,{\text{♡}}\,{\text{first}}\,{\text{and a}}\,{\text{♠}}\,{\text{second}})</annotation></semantics></math>
